Articles.Content: Was landing a rover on Mun with MechJeb, in a polar orbit. Then I changed directions at the last moment, 'causing MechJeb to freak out a bit and unable to slow down in time. Once I realized a crash was going to occur, I started taking screenshots as fast as I could. Final speed was 122m/s. The crash was great!
I have used the outrigger type of config also works well in the lower gravity ..mostly.. and yep..nice crash
If this would be at minimus.... You could enyoy 10 minutes of explosions.
